name: solarsentinel-depin
description: Proof-of-concept AI-powered DePIN for predictive solar panel monitoring in rural Africa

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../simulator && npm install && cd ../ai-server && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:simulator" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.dev:ai: cd ai-server && source venv/bin/activate && python server.py

author: SolarSentinel Team
